name: MotoGP 21
overview: Live the 2021 Season at its fullest with the classes MotoGP™, Moto2™, Moto3™. Live the most authentic and immersive 2-wheels racing experience with more than 120 official riders, over 20 tracks and new and improved features for an unprecedented level of realism. And for the first time, the Long Lap Penalty. Relive the history of MotoGP™ with more than 40 historic riders and their iconic bikes.
